owlSpeak.engine

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • owlSpeak.engine.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    owlSpeak Class Settings is used for reading / writing the settings of the Controller
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dan Denich, Stefan Ultes <stefan.ultes@uni-ulm.de>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Settings.Ontology
      Class Ontology stores a name, a description and a file for reading and writing ontologies to disk
      class  Settings.UserOntoSetting
      Class UserOntoSetting stores an ontoname and ontostatus for individual users
      class  Settings.Usersetting
      Class Usersetting stores settings for the individual user

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String asrMode
      A String specifying the asr input language to be used
      static int asrModeID
      A int specifying the id of the asr input language to be used
      static boolean callRecording
      A boolean specifying if the calls should be recorded.
      static boolean collectOptimizationData
      A boolean specifying if data should be collected for optimizing the policy.
      static boolean dbLogging
      A boolean specifying if dialogue parameters should be written to database
      static boolean deriveQuality
      A boolean specifying if interaction quality is being derived during the interaction.
      static java.lang.String homePath
      The Home folder's location (e.g., "C:\OwlSpeak\").
      static int loopDuration
      Duration of the loop used between two requests
      static int matchagenda
      used to set the Controller to different Agenda-Priority calculation modes. 0=static, 1=dynamic (Priority will increase over time) dynamic: prio = prio + ( (actualtime-AgendaAddTime) * prio / Settings.matchagendapriofactor);
      static int matchagendapriofactor
      factor used for the dynamic Agenda-Priority calculation
      static int maxspeechtimeout
      The max speech timeout
      static Settings.Ontology[] ontologies
      An array of Ontologys that are stored on the harddisk
      static java.lang.String platform
      The sip Adress (sip:) or the telefone number (tel:) of the dialogue application
      static int plugin
      the binary-code of the plugin, which should be selected 000 -> all Plugins deactivated 001 -> Keywordspotting 010 -> Levensthein 100 -> GermaNet
      static java.lang.String settingsFile
      The path to the SettingsFile
      static java.lang.String speakRate
      The speaking Rate
      static java.lang.String[] sysCommands
      An array of strings that specifies the System-Commands (must be present as Respawns in the System-Ontology to work
      static java.lang.String ttsMode
      A String specifying the tts output voice to be used
      static int ttsModeID
      A int specifying the id of the tts output voice to be used
      static java.lang.String uri
      The address of the base-ontology as defined in the SettingsFile
      static java.lang.String[] usernames
      An array of strings that specifies the usernames
      static Settings.Usersetting[] usersetting
      An array of Usersettings
      static int youpi
      the deactivation switch for the UPNP system (0=off,1=on)
      static java.lang.String youpiFriendlyName
      the friendly name of the Youpi UPnP device.
      static java.lang.String youpiID
      the long ID of the Youpi UPnP device.
      static java.lang.String youpiPath
      the path to the device description of the Youpi UPnP wrapper.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Settings()
      the Constructor calls the reload method

      Gets the number of the user, for accessing his settings

      Gets the Usersetting of the username
      void reload()
      Reloads the Settings object from the Settings file on the harddisk
      void write()
      Writes the actual Settings from the Settings object to the Settings file on hdd TODO add newly created settings elements

    • Field Detail

      • settingsFile

        public static final java.lang.String settingsFile
        The path to the SettingsFile

      • platform

        public static java.lang.String platform
        The sip Adress (sip:) or the telefone number (tel:) of the dialogue application

      • uri

        public static java.lang.String uri
        The address of the base-ontology as defined in the SettingsFile

      • homePath

        public static java.lang.String homePath
        The Home folder's location (e.g., "C:\OwlSpeak\").

      • plugin

        public static int plugin
        the binary-code of the plugin, which should be selected
        • 000 -> all Plugins deactivated
        • 001 -> Keywordspotting
        • 010 -> Levensthein
        • 100 -> GermaNet

      • ttsMode

        public static java.lang.String ttsMode
        A String specifying the tts output voice to be used

      • matchagenda

        public static int matchagenda
        used to set the Controller to different Agenda-Priority calculation modes. 0=static, 1=dynamic (Priority will increase over time) dynamic: prio = prio + ( (actualtime-AgendaAddTime) * prio / Settings.matchagendapriofactor);

      • matchagendapriofactor

        public static int matchagendapriofactor
        factor used for the dynamic Agenda-Priority calculation

      • getuserpos

        public static int getuserpos(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the number of the user, for accessing his settings
        Parameters:
        username - the username that should be matched
        Returns:
        the position of the username in the username array

      • getontopos

        public int getontopos(java.lang.String ontoname)
        Gets the number of the ontology
        Parameters:
        ontoname - the ontoname that should be matched
        Returns:
        the position of the ontoname in the ontologies array
